CourseAdminEmail:
Admin Email is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example of Admin Email: test@gmail.com
CourseCode:
Course Code is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 01
CourseDescription:
Course Description is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: Course is about...
CourseReferenceNumber:
Internal Course Reference Number is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload
Example of Course References Number: TGS-12345678
CourseRegistrationDateClose:
Closing Registration Date (YYYYMMDD) is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 20210621
CourseRegistrationDateOpen:
Opening Registration Date (YYYYMMDD) is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 20210617
CourseRunId:
'The Course Run Id is used as a URL for GET Request Call
Example: https://api.ssg-wsg.sg/courses/runs/{runId}'
CourseStartDate:
Course Start Date(YYYYMMDD) is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Course Start Date should be later than Opening/Closing Registration Date 
Example: 20210628
CourseEndDate:
Course End Date(YYYYMMDD) is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Course End Date should be later than Opening/Closing Registration and Course Start Date 
Example: 20210628
CourseModeOfTraining:
Mode of Training is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 9
CourseRunRoom:
Course Run Room Number  is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 9
CourseRunFloor:
The level of the Course Run room is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 9
CourseRunUnit:
The unit of the Course Run room is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 12
CourseRunPostalCode:
The postal code of the Course Run Venue is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 12345
SessionModeOfTraining:
Mode of Training is used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 9
SessionEndDate:
End Date (YYYYMMDD) can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 20210621
SessionEndTime:
End time (HH:MM) can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 18:30
SessionStartDate:
Start Date (YYYYMMDD) can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 20210616
SessionStartTime:
Start time (HH:MM) can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: 17:30
TrainerCode:
Code of Trainer can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
1 - Existing, 2 - New 
Example: 1
TrainerDescription:
Simple description of trainer can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: New Trainer
TrainerEmail:
Email of trainner canbe used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: tester@gmail.com
TrainerName:
Name of the trainer can be used as a parameter in the POST Request payload 
Example: John
